segments.advisor_message: So, uh, could you tell me, like, who owns this, um, investment you mentioned? And, like, what type it is? I mean, is it an ISA or somethin' else?
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, it's actually my, uh, brother's ISA. Uh, he set it up, like, long ago. I think the current value, um, is about 10 thousand dollars, if I'm not mistaken. It's all with, uh, XYZ Bank. They, uh, have been really good at managing it.
